prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a flowing mane and elegant stature.
Imagine a mythical creature that embodies both strength and grace under the sea.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that resembles a horse, with vibrant blue and red colors.
Design a unique Pokemon that combines equine features with aquatic elements.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a noble steed with a magical aura.
Give me a creature that exudes elegance, standing tall with a flowing tail.
Make a new Pokemon inspired by Keldeo, focusing on its swift and agile traits.
